PersonName.FormattedName: Hitesh Parikh, Senior Software Engineer at Innovify

StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary:
• Total 11 years of experience including in 8 years in Web Development
• Currently working as Sr. Software Engineer in Innovify since January 2018
• Responsible and goal-oriented person Creative approach to given tasks
• Ability to solve complex business technical problems and hands on experience with huge data driven applications
• Analytical skill to determine the project architecture
• Excellent mentoring and coaching skills

PositionHistory.Title: Lead Developer
PositionHistory.Description:
Tools & Technologies: NodeJS, MongoDB, ReactJS, JavaScript, Firefox extension API, lambda functions, API gateway, cloud front, Google Recaptcha, Mailchimp
Team Size: 7 team members

Football Betting Application
Project Description: This is football betting app where people connect and earn tokens via betting. There are many exiting features like Bet with Friend, Leader Boards, bet with multiple possibility which increase the chance of winning bet. This product is very critical for client for Football World Cup 2018. And we deliver the same in such a tight deadline. I was the lead developer for the product with the team size of 4 developers.
Project Role: Lead Developer
Tools & Technologies: PHP, MySQL, yii2, pwa (service worker), and Nginx, EC2
Team Size: 4 team members

Data Analysis Platform for Green Energy
Project Description: A data driven application to calculate energy generated by solar panel register.
Project Role: Lead Developer
Tools & Technologies: NodeJS, AngularJS, MongoDB, JavaScript, EC2, CloudFront
Team Size: 4 team members

Dating Application
Project Description: Dating application (Android Native) which has many features like user search, Date Set and Chat with multiple option. I was a part of project management team and handle the development with db design and other work-flows.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 96% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Lead Developer
PositionHistory.Description:
Tools & Technologies: NodeJS, MongoDB, Express
Team Size: 6 team members


Selling Traditional Food Products
Project Description: An E-Commerce platform build with woo-commerce plug-in. It is for selling the traditional food products with payment gateway and shipment implementation. I was responsible for gathering requirement and customize the solution accordingly.
Project Role: Senior Developer
Tools & Technologies: WordPress, HTML, Less, jQuery, Woo-commerce.
Team Size: 2 team members

Renting - Storage Facility (Enterprise Product)
Project Description: This product has many features like rent a storage facility, handle a support call centre, Get the real time status of storage details. I was a part of development team.
Project Role: Senior Developer
Tools & Technologies: PHP, CodeIgniter, JavaScript, jQuery
Team Size: 5 team members

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 78% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Senior Developer
PositionHistory.Description:
Project Description: A web portal where a people can search and getting the background of tourist place of Gujarat. I was the lead developer to implementation.
Project Role: Senior Developer
Tools & Technologies: PHP, CodeIgniter, Ajax, jQuery
Team Size: 8 team members

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 100% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: local social worker networking
PositionHistory.Description:
Project Description: A problem resolution social media network. On this portal people put their problems and initiatives. So, Political Party cell can identify the problems and make a progress towards its solutions. It is kind of local social worker networking.
Project Role: PHP Developer
Team Size: 5 team members


Website Ads Proxy
Project Description: This is an advertisement provider for small publisher and advertiser focusing on India Business. So, this product is to serve ads to Website requests. Publisher and Advertiser can manage their ads using this platform.
Tools & Technologies: PHP, CodeIgniter, Ajax, jQuery
Team Size: 1 team member

Mobile Ads Proxy
Project Description: This is an advertisement provider for small publisher and advertiser focusing on India Business. So, this product is to serve ads to Website requests. Publisher and Advertiser can manage their ads using this platform.
Platform: Core PHP
Team Size: 1 team member

Prototype Replica of Google Search
Project Description: This is the search engine prototype replica of Google search. It has the same feature as google search to identify that how search engine can be managed, and we put CPC or CPI at the top, side and bottom.
Platform: Core PHP
Team Size: 1 team member

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 70% of this job

NonXMLResume.TextResume:
SR. SOFTWARE ENGINEER
Summary

• Total 11 years of experience including in 8 years in Web Development
• Currently working as Sr. Software Engineer in Innovify since January 2018
• Responsible and goal-oriented person Creative approach to given tasks
• Ability to solve complex business technical problems and hands on experience with huge data driven applications
• Analytical skill to determine the project architecture
• Excellent mentoring and coaching skills

Education:
B.E. in Computer Science from Institute of Electronics and Telecommunications Engineering, India (2011)


Skills
Development:
PHP, Node.JS, WordPress, CodeIgniter, Laravel, Yii2, Express, ReactJS, Angular, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Ajax, jQuery, Linux, Windows, Nginx, Apache2, Git, Code (Visual Studio), NetBeans, Dream viewer and PhpStorm
Data:
MySQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, MS Access
Cloud:
Amazon S3, EC2, ELB, ES, Lambda, CloudFront, Route 53, SQS, SES, API gateway
Project Execution:
Agile, SCRUM, Kanban, Waterfall, Pair Programming, Iterative
Engineering Practices:
Continuous Integration, Continuous Development, Code Review, Code Versioning, Test Driven Development, Refactoring
